plot: The story of a woman who has to lose everything to find the strength to fight back. The story of a woman who's willing to go all the way to get her dignity back.
title: Chop Shop
plot_es: The story of a woman who has to lose everything to find the strength to fight back. The story of a woman who's willing to go all the way to get her dignity back.
